mapper.sql: dept_dm, dept_type, dept_sj_dm, bmmc, dept_dydm, qybj, czrq, xgrq, user_dm, dept_sort
mapper.insert:
insert into dm_cs_dept
dept_type,
dept_sj_dm,
bmmc,
dept_dydm,
qybj,
czrq,
xgrq,
user_dm,
dept_sort,
#{deptType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deptSjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptDydm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deptSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dm_cs_dept
dept_type = #{deptType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dept_sj_dm = #{deptSjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bmmc = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_dydm = #{deptDydm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dept_sort = #{deptSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_cs_dept set dept_type = #{deptType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_sj_dm = #{deptSjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bmmc = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_dydm = #{deptDydm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_sort = #{deptSort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dept_dm = #{deptDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bmmc from dm_cs_dept d INNER JOIN dm_cs_user u Where d.dept_dm = u.dept_dm and u.user_dm = #{userDm}
select dept_dm from dm_cs_dept where bmmc = #{deptName} and qybj = 1
select dept_dm from dm_cs_dept where dept_sj_dm = #{deptDm} and qybj = 1
select * from dm_cs_dept where dept_sj_dm = #{deptDm} and qybj = 1 order by dept_sort asc
select * from dm_cs_dept where qybj = 1 and dept_type in (2, 3)
select * from dm_cs_dept where dept_sj_dm = #{area} and qybj = 1
select * from dm_cs_dept where dept_type = #{type} and qybj = 1 order by czrq asc
